metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2381 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Perl might allow context-dependent attackers to bypass the taint protection mechanism in a child process via duplicate environment variables in envp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2381` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcgi-fast-perl - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.1
libperl5.18 - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.1
perl - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.1
perl-base - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.1
perl-debug - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.1
perl-modules - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: perl package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.18.2-2ubuntu1.1').
